reviews.review_msg: I have taken her class twice now and I genuinely enjoyed her classes the second time around. She really does care about her students and is very caring. If you are having a difficult situation and let her know, she is willing to delay your due dates for minor assignments. Her marking is very fair and knows how to give critical reflections.

Anushay is an amazing professor and she very accommodating during online classes. A truly caring and passionate professor with interesting lectures. She is also available outside of class and holds extra office hours for any last minute questions before an assignment is due. She is somewhat tough on grading, but is very fair
